DataElement.preferredName: Brain Magnetic Resonance Imaging Diffusion Outcome Assessment Performed Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An organ composed of grey and white matter containing billions of neurons that is the center for intelligence and reasoning. It is protected by the bony cranium._Imaging that uses radiofrequency waves and a strong magnetic field rather than x-rays to provide amazingly clear and detailed pictures of internal organs and tissues. The technique is valuable for the diagnosis of many pathologic conditions, including cancer, heart and vascular disease, stroke, and joint and musculoskeletal disorders._The movement of chemical species under the influence of a concentration difference and as a result of random thermal agitation. The species will move from the high concentration area to the low concentration area till the concentration is uniform in the whole phase._The result of an action._The condition or state of an evaluation being performed at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: An organ composed of grey and white matter containing billions of neurons that is the center for intelligence and reasoning. It is protected by the bony cranium.

Imaging that uses radiofrequency waves and a strong magnetic field rather than x-rays to provide detailed pictures of internal organs and tissues. The technique is valuable for the diagnosis of many pathologic conditions, including cancer, heart and vascular disease, stroke, and joint and musculoskeletal disorders.

Property.preferredDefinition: The movement of chemical species under the influence of a concentration difference and as a result of random thermal agitation. The species will move from the high concentration area to the low concentration area till the concentration is uniform in the whole phase.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: The movement of chemical species under the influence of a concentration difference and as a result of random thermal agitation. The species will move from the high concentration area to the low concentration area till the concentration is uniform in the whole phase.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Released as part of the 3Q2015 draft content review_ghd_07.13.15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The condition or state of an evaluation being performed at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has been performed and completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has been performed and completed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
